sentences.en: American Airlines is the third-largest carrier at Denver International Airport.
sentences.cn: 美国航空公司是丹佛国际机场第三大客运航空公司。

sentences.en: Ukraine will surpass Brazil this year as the world's third-largest corn exporter.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰今年将取代巴西，成为全球第三大玉米出口国。

sentences.en: Prudential's flotation will be the third largest this year, behind Kraft Foods and Agere Systems.
sentences.cn: 保诚公司的股票发行量今年将排名第3，仅次于卡夫食品和杰尔系统。
